DataElement.preferredName: Tumor Segment Percent Tumor Surface Area Integer
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An integer number between 0 and 100 to capture the area of tissue surface in a sample that is tumorous tissue, expressed as a percentage.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Segment Percent Tumor Surface Area
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into three to five aliquots, of specified cancer tissue suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis._A quantitative measurement of the area of tissue surface in a sample that is tumorous tissue, expressed as a percentage.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into three to five aliquots, of specified cancer tissue suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis.

Concepts.definition: Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into three to five aliquots, of specified cancer tissue suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis.

Property.preferredDefinition: A quantitative measurement of the area of tissue surface in a sample that is tumorous tissue, expressed as a percentage.

Concepts.definition: A quantitative measurement of the area of tissue surface in a sample that is tumorous tissue, expressed as a percentage.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Abnormalities that occur in human cells and tissues and models of human cancer.

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/18/21 jk created for CPTAC CM Path Review CRF.
DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 9/20/22 Released for HNSCC Path Review per jk. mr;

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A positive number with no fractional part between 0 and 100.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.

ValueDomain.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 1/22/20 jk released per CPTAC SME's review of PRAD Path Review CDE set.  8/7/19 jk created for CPTAC baseline CRFs.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Percent of the surface area of the entire section that is tumor
